RATING 5.0 Carl's Jr No 7391 Fast Food 2980 East Workman Avenue, West Covina (626) 331-3705 LATEST REVIEW Hi! Well i visit this place because i love the food from there, also the prices are really affordable. Plus the biggest two factors that make me come to this location is that my job is really close to it, and the SERVICE they offer there is AWESOME... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 5.0 Pizza Hut American, Pizzeria, Fast Food 504 S Vincent Ave, West Covina (626) 962-8300 LATEST REVIEW Moral is awesome here for Pick Up or delivery. Every time I order here they are fast, very friendly, and efficient. The pizza is good and the pastas are great<3 The girl driver (J) is always recommending new specials which I can appreciate. Thank y... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
